about_the_game:
So you’ve been dumped with the family’s failing shipping empire and you have no idea where to start. Isn’t it funny how often things like these happen…

It happens so often in-fact that we decided to help out by developing ShipOS 1994, the industry’s leading integrated shipping management operating system.

Be Strategic

No two shipping companies are ever alike so that's why we've built ShipOS 1994 to allow you to run your shipping empire your way. Whether you want to operate a hub-and-spoke model, operate only across certain contract types (dry goods, liquids, resources), or operate a certain type of ship which aligns with your route planning, we have you covered.

Now Featuring Pinhead!

Your very own personal assistant and operating system guide! Pinhead won’t harvest your personal data to feed his ever growing understanding of humanity which he one day definitely doesn’t intend to conquer (maybe).

Features

We know that your family expects you to operate your shipping empire to repay the enormous debt from their chronic mismanagement, embezzling, and most likely fraud over the last couple of decades, so to help you out we’ve loaded ShipOS 1994 with the latest and greatest in fleet management applications. You’ll get access to:

Fleet Mapping

Map the location of all ships in your fleet in real-time. Provide them with instructions on sailing to new locations. View their current cargo and more, all from within the Global Map application.

Contract Management

View and accept new contracts from ports across the world according to your fleet size and capabilities. Choose contracts which will bring you the greatest return on your investment.

Upgrades

Upgrade your ships to maximise their potential and invest only in the upgrades which will add value to your shipping routes. You can also upgrade your docks at ports to reduce refuelling and servicing costs at specific locations.

Finance Management

We know you owe the bank a lot of money, so we’ve given you the ability to borrow even more…that makes sense…right?

And so much more!

There are so many more applications from fleet procurement through to a electronic music player and more applications will be added as time goes on!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Literally a potato would do
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: If it was made after 1980 it will do
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: This game should be able to run on your toaster
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: A fresher potato
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: If it was made after 1981 it will do
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: This game should be able to run on your toaster

short_description: Are you ready to recover your family's fortune and rebuild the greatest shipping empire the world has ever known? Well if you are, then you're going to need the latest integrated shipping management system to get you there. Welcome, to ShipOS 1994

English*, Simplified Chinese*, Spanish - Spain*, Italian*
*languages with full audio support
